alert.note: Alert for Allamakee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:17AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact far northeast Iowa and far southeastern Minnesota through NOON CDT... At 1114 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mabel to near Decorah. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and penny size hail could occur. SOURCE...Law enforcement has reported nickel sized hail and pockets of minor tree branch damage with this storm. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spring Grove around 1125 AM CDT. Caledonia around 1135 AM CDT. New Albin around 1145 AM CDT. Brownsville around 1150 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Hanover, County 16 And 4 Corners Drive, County Roads A 26 And X 6 A, Quandahl, Riceford, County 5 And Peyton Road, Newhouse, Dun Romin Park Campground, Eitzen and Newburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
